name: Haglund Kelley LLP
description: This firm has extensive experience representing Indian tribes and Alaska Natives in various legal areas, including litigation

name: Dorsey & Whitney LLP
address: 111 SW Columbia Street, Suite 1000, Portland, OR 97201

name: Stoel Rives LLP

name: Legal Aid Services of Oregon (Native American Program)
address: 520 SW Harrison Street, Suite 300, Portland, OR 97201
description: This program provides legal services to low-income tribe members, tribes, and affiliated groups in Oregon, including representation in tribal court and cases related to tribal status
